blogPost.excerpt: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.
blogPost.body: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.

blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 通过Unfold的Bio网站以一个链接分享您的网站、产品、社交页面等。你有多个链接，你的简历也应该有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的链接。与您的观众联系。

localize.description: 通過Unfold的Bio網站以一個鏈接分享您的網站、產品、社交頁面等。你有多個鏈接，你的簡歷也應該有。可在iOS和Android的Unfold中使用。
localize.tagline: 分享您的鏈接。與您的觀衆聯繫。
